verses.verse: Now it came to pass<WH1961> in the thirtieth<WH7970> year,<WH8141> in the fourth<WH7243> month, in the fifth<WH2568> day of the month,<WH2320> as I<WH589> was among<WH8432> the captives<WH1473> by<WH5921> the river<WH5104> of Chebar,<WH3529> that the heavens<WH8064> were opened,<WH6605> and I saw<WH7200> visions<WH4759> of God.<WH430>
In the fifth<WH2568> day of the month,<WH2320> which<WH1931> was the fifth<WH2549> year<WH8141> of king<WH4428> Jehoiachin's<WH3112> captivity,<WH1546>

The word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came expressly<WH1961> <WH1961> unto<WH413> Ezekiel<WH3168> the priest,<WH3548> the son<WH1121> of Buzi,<WH941> in the land<WH776> of the Chaldeans<WH3778> by<WH5921> the river<WH5104> Chebar;<WH3529> and the hand<WH3027> of the LORD<WH3068> was<WH1961> there<WH8033> upon<WH5921> him.

And I looked,<WH7200> and, behold,<WH2009> a whirlwind<WH7307> <WH5591> came<WH935> out of<WH4480> the north,<WH6828> a great<WH1419> cloud,<WH6051> and a fire<WH784> enfolding itself,<WH3947> and a brightness<WH5051> was about<WH5439> it, and out of the midst<WH4480> <WH8432> thereof as the color<WH5869> of amber,<WH2830> out of the midst<WH4480> <WH8432> of the fire.<WH784>

Also out of the midst<WH4480> <WH8432> thereof came the likeness<WH1823> of four<WH702> living creatures.<WH2416> And this<WH2088> was their appearance;<WH4758> they<WH2007> had the likeness<WH1823> of a man.<WH120>
And every one<WH259> had four<WH702> faces,<WH6440> and every one<WH259> had four<WH702> wings.<WH3671>

And their feet<WH7272> were straight<WH3477> feet;<WH7272> and the sole<WH3709> of their feet<WH7272> was like the sole<WH3709> of a calf's<WH5695> foot:<WH7272> and they sparkled<WH5340> like the color<WH5869> of burnished<WH7044> brass.<WH5178>

And they had the hands<WH3027> of a man<WH120> under<WH4480> <WH8478> their wings<WH3671> on<WH5921> their four<WH702> sides;<WH7253> and they four<WH702> had their faces<WH6440> and their wings.<WH3671>

Their wings<WH3671> were joined<WH2266> one<WH802> to<WH413> another;<WH269> they turned<WH5437> not<WH3808> when they went;<WH1980> they went<WH1980> every one<WH376> straight<WH5676> forward.<WH6440>

As for the likeness<WH1823> of their faces,<WH6440> they four<WH702> had the face<WH6440> of a man,<WH120> and the face<WH6440> of a lion,<WH738> on<WH413> the right side:<WH3225> and they four<WH702> had the face<WH6440> of an ox<WH7794> on the left side;<WH4480> <WH8040> they four<WH702> also had the face<WH6440> of an eagle.<WH5404>

Thus were their faces:<WH6440> and their wings<WH3671> were stretched<WH6504> upward;<WH4480> <WH4605> two<WH8147> wings of every one<WH376> were joined<WH2266> one to another,<WH376> and two<WH8147> covered<WH3680> <WH853> their bodies.<WH1472>

And they went<WH1980> every one<WH376> straight<WH5676> forward:<WH6440> whither<WH834> <WH8033> the spirit<WH7307> was<WH1961> to go,<WH1980> they went;<WH1980> and they turned<WH5437> not<WH3808> when they went.<WH1980>

As for the likeness<WH1823> of the living creatures,<WH2416> their appearance<WH4758> was like burning<WH1197> coals<WH1513> of fire,<WH784> and like the appearance<WH4758> of lamps:<WH3940> it<WH1931> went up and down<WH1980> among<WH996> the living creatures;<WH2416> and the fire<WH784> was bright,<WH5051> and out of<WH4480> the fire<WH784> went forth<WH3318> lightning.<WH1300>
And the living creatures<WH2416> ran<WH7519> and returned<WH7725> as the appearance<WH4758> of a flash of lightning.<WH965>
Now as I beheld<WH7200> the living creatures,<WH2416> behold<WH2009> one<WH259> wheel<WH212> upon the earth<WH776> by<WH681> the living creatures,<WH2416> with his four<WH702> faces.<WH6440>

The appearance<WH4758> of the wheels<WH212> and their work<WH4639> was like unto the color<WH5869> of a beryl:<WH8658> and they four<WH702> had one<WH259> likeness:<WH1823> and their appearance<WH4758> and their work<WH4639> was as<WH834> it were<WH1961> a wheel<WH212> in the middle<WH8432> of a wheel.<WH212>
When they went,<WH1980> they went<WH1980> upon<WH5921> their four<WH702> sides:<WH7253> and they turned<WH5437> not<WH3808> when they went.<WH1980>
As for their rings,<WH1354> they were so high<WH1363> that they were dreadful;<WH3374> and their rings<WH1354> were full<WH4392> of eyes<WH5869> round about<WH5439> them four.<WH702>

And when the living creatures<WH2416> went,<WH1980> the wheels<WH212> went<WH1980> by<WH681> them: and when the living creatures<WH2416> were lifted up<WH5375> from<WH4480> <WH5921> the earth,<WH776> the wheels<WH212> were lifted up.<WH5375>

Whithersoever <WH5921> <WH834> <WH8033> the spirit<WH7307> was<WH1961> to go,<WH1980> they went,<WH1980> thither<WH8033> was their spirit<WH7307> to go;<WH1980> and the wheels<WH212> were lifted up<WH5375> over against<WH5980> them: for<WH3588> the spirit<WH7307> of the living creature<WH2416> was in the wheels.<WH212>

When those went,<WH1980> these went;<WH1980> and when those stood,<WH5975> these stood;<WH5975> and when those were lifted up<WH5375> from<WH4480> <WH5921> the earth,<WH776> the wheels<WH212> were lifted up<WH5375> over against<WH5980> them: for<WH3588> the spirit<WH7307> of the living creature<WH2416> was in the wheels.<WH212>

And the likeness<WH1823> of the firmament<WH7549> upon<WH5921> the heads<WH7218> of the living creature<WH2416> was as the color<WH5869> of the terrible<WH3372> crystal,<WH7140> stretched forth<WH5186> over<WH5921> their heads<WH7218> above.<WH4480> <WH4605>

And under<WH8478> the firmament<WH7549> were their wings<WH3671> straight,<WH3477> the one<WH802> toward<WH413> the other:<WH269> every one<WH376> had two,<WH8147> which covered<WH3680> on this side,<WH2007> and every one<WH376> had two,<WH8147> which covered<WH3680> on that side,<WH2007> <WH853> their bodies.<WH1472>

And when they went,<WH1980> I heard<WH8085> <WH853> the noise<WH6963> of their wings,<WH3671> like the noise<WH6963> of great<WH7227> waters,<WH4325> as the voice<WH6963> of the Almighty,<WH7706> the voice<WH6963> of speech,<WH1999> as the noise<WH6963> of a host:<WH4264> when they stood,<WH5975> they let down<WH7503> their wings.<WH3671>

And there was<WH1961> a voice<WH6963> from<WH4480> <WH5921> the firmament<WH7549> that<WH834> was over<WH5921> their heads,<WH7218> when they stood,<WH5975> and had let down<WH7503> their wings.<WH3671>

And above<WH4480> <WH4605> the firmament<WH7549> that<WH834> was over<WH5921> their heads<WH7218> was the likeness<WH1823> of a throne,<WH3678> as the appearance<WH4758> of a sapphire<WH5601> stone:<WH68> and upon<WH5921> the likeness<WH1823> of the throne<WH3678> was the likeness<WH1823> as the appearance<WH4758> of a man<WH120> above<WH4480> <WH4605> upon<WH5921> it.

And I saw<WH7200> as the color<WH5869> of amber,<WH2830> as the appearance<WH4758> of fire<WH784> round about<WH5439> within<WH1004> it, from the appearance<WH4480> <WH4758> of his loins<WH4975> even upward,<WH4605> and from the appearance<WH4480> <WH4758> of his loins<WH4975> even downward,<WH4295> I saw<WH7200> as it were the appearance<WH4758> of fire,<WH784> and it had brightness<WH5051> round about.<WH5439>

As the appearance<WH4758> of the bow<WH7198> that<WH834> is<WH1961> in the cloud<WH6051> in the day<WH3117> of rain,<WH1653> so<WH3651> was the appearance<WH4758> of the brightness<WH5051> round about.<WH5439> This<WH1931> was the appearance<WH4758> of the likeness<WH1823> of the glory<WH3519> of the LORD.<WH3068> And when I saw<WH7200> it, I fell<WH5307> upon<WH5921> my face,<WH6440> and I heard<WH8085> a voice<WH6963> of one that spoke.<WH1696>
